title: The owner shall give advance possession of the land to be handed over to MCGM/MHADA/Appropriate Authority, wherever applicable, at the time of seeking permission for development of plot
clause_text: The owner shall give advance possession of the land to be handed over to MCGM/MHADA/Appropriate Authority, wherever applicable, at the time of seeking permission for development of plot. It shall be the responsibility of the land owner to clear off all encumbrances and complete the formalities towards transferring the land in the name of MCGM/MHADA/Appropriate Authority in Land Revenue Record.
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones
